Hello,

I am running the newest version of Gladiator 'Advertised' on the 
registered Users page. (I am registered, but forgot to save it to a 
disk when I reformated.) I attempted to run GLAD.EXE, but it 
said 'Error opening glad.cfg.' What should I do?
